name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Reddit Ad Blocker - Hide Promoted Posts

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Block promoted posts and hide ads on Reddit

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Hide Reddit ads and promoted posts from your feed. 

Free tool to hide promoted posts and ads on Reddit.

Tired of being tricked by promoted ads disguised as real posts on Reddit?

Start enjoying an ad free experience on Reddit by automatically hiding ads and promoted posts.

Install the Reddit Ad Blocker extension and Reddit ads disappear automatically. 

Free with no account or sign in required. This extension does not store any data.
